samples.instruction: NRI property sell seyya POA kodukkalaama?
samples.current_output: Aama, aanaal Special Power of Attorney (SPA) irukkanum - specific property, specific purpose mention aaganum. Indian Embassy/Consulate-la notarize + apostille venum. GPA alone not sufficient. SPA registration recommended.

samples.instruction: Medical negligence-kku consumer court-la case podalaamaa?
samples.current_output: Aama. Doctors, hospitals ellam 'service provider' category-la varum. Wrong diagnosis, treatment failure, surgery complications, hospital infection - ellaathukkum case podalam. Aanaal 'bonafide mistake'-kkum 'negligence'-kkum vithiyaasam prove pannanum.

samples.instruction: Owner veettu lock udaichu saamaan veliye pottaar - enna seivathu?
samples.current_output: Idhu serious criminal offence - house trespass, criminal intimidation, theft aagum. Udanadi: 1) Police-la FIR podunga (IPC 448, 441), 2) Magistrate Court-la complaint, 3) Civil Court-la damages claim seyyalam. Photos, videos evidence-aa vaichukonga.

samples.instruction: Right to be forgotten endraal enna?
samples.current_output: Online-la ulla personal information delete seyya request pannum right. DPDP Act 2023-la provision undu. Google search results remove: Google legal removal request. Social media: Platform privacy settings. Court orders moolamum removal possible.

samples.instruction: Senior citizen-ai pillaigal paarkala, maintenance ketkalaamaa?
samples.current_output: Maintenance and Welfare of Parents and Senior Citizens Act 2007: 1) Children/relatives maintenance taranum, 2) Tribunal: SDM/Collector level, 3) Max: Rs.10,000/month per child, 4) Non-compliance: 1 month jail + fine. Property transfer-kku pin neglect: Transfer cancel pannalam. Free legal aid: District Legal Services Authority. Helpline: 14567 (Elder helpline).

samples.instruction: ATM-la panam poachu aana account-la debit aachu, enna seivathu?
samples.current_output: Steps: 1) Udane bank-kku call pannunga (customer care), 2) Written complaint kodunga - transaction ID mention pannunga, 3) RBI rule: Bank 5 days-kkul refund pannanum, 4) Delay aanaal: Rs.100/day compensation, 5) Resolve aagala = Banking Ombudsman complaint. Evidence: Transaction SMS, mini statement vachukonga.

samples.instruction: Notice period serve pannama resign pannalaamaa?
samples.current_output: Buy-out option: Notice pay koduthu immediately exit. Absconding: Risky - relieving letter, experience certificate kidaikkaadhu. Background verification-la problem. Negotiate with HR - most companies accept buy-out. New offer delay aanaal wait pannunga.

Options: 1) Labour Commissioner complaint, 2) Labour Court (Industrial Disputes Act), 3) Civil Court. Remedies: Reinstatement, back wages, compensation. Document everything: Termination letter, emails, performance records. Time limit: 3 years from termination date.

samples.instruction: Property sell aanaal tenant enna aagum?
samples.current_output: Registered agreement irundhaal new owner-um adhai honor seyya venum. Agreement period mudiyum varai tenant continue seyyalam. New owner arbitrary eviction seyya mudiyaadhu. Sale-kku mun tenant-kku inform seivathu good practice.
